description:
“It’s critical to not only back up your critical workloads, but also to secure those backups against subsequent modification and deletion."

The post Google Introduces ‘Air-Gapped’ Backup Vault to Thwart Ransomware appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Google Introduces ‘Air-Gapped’ Backup Vault to Thwart Ransomware

description:
SplxAI has raised $2 million in pre-seed funding to help organizations identify vulnerabilities in AI chat applications.

The post SplxAI Raises $2 Million to Protect AI Chatbot Apps appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: SplxAI Raises $2 Million to Protect AI Chatbot Apps

description:
The Tel Aviv company attracts $15 million in a Series A investment to build an AI-powered compliance and risk management platform.

The post Compliance and Risk Management Startup Datricks Raises $15 Million appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Compliance and Risk Management Startup Datricks Raises $15 Million

description:
Intel on Tuesday published advisories covering more than 20 vulnerabilities affecting processors and other products.

The post Intel Informs Customers About Over a Dozen Processor Vulnerabilities appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Intel Informs Customers About Over a Dozen Processor Vulnerabilities

description:
Five reasons why “Ambulance Chasing” and mocking harm the security profession and are never a good idea.

The post Beyond Immature Rhetoric: The Case Against Mockery and Ambulance Chasing in the Security Industry appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Beyond Immature Rhetoric: The Case Against Mockery and Ambulance Chasing in the Security Industry

description:
Noise generated by the pixels on a screen can be leveraged to exfiltrate data from air-gapped computers in what is called a PIXHELL attack.

The post PIXHELL Attack Allows Air-Gap Jumping via Noise From Screens appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: PIXHELL Attack Allows Air-Gap Jumping via Noise From Screens

description:
Microsoft has started introducing support for post-quantum algorithms in SymCrypt, its main cryptographic library.

The post Microsoft Adds Support for Post-Quantum Algorithms in SymCrypt Library appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Microsoft Adds Support for Post-Quantum Algorithms in SymCrypt Library

description:
Ivanti has released patches for multiple vulnerabilities in Endpoint Manager, Cloud Service Appliance, and Workspace Control.

The post Ivanti Patches Critical Vulnerabilities in Endpoint Manager appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Ivanti Patches Critical Vulnerabilities in Endpoint Manager

description:
Golf course management company KemperSports has disclosed a cyberattack and data breach impacting over 62,000 individuals. 

The post Data Breach at Golf Course Management Firm KemperSports Impacts 62,000 appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Data Breach at Golf Course Management Firm KemperSports Impacts 62,000

description:
Google has released a Chrome 128 security update to resolve high-severity memory safety vulnerabilities.

The post Chrome 128 Update Resolves High-Severity Vulnerabilities appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Chrome 128 Update Resolves High-Severity Vulnerabilities

description:
Two dozen ICS Patch Tuesday advisories have been published by Siemens, Schneider Electric, CISA and ABB.

title: ICS Patch Tuesday: Advisories Published by Siemens, Schneider, ABB, CISA
